attributes.action: to remove speed cameras and increase traffic patrols to police driver behaviour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In particular to enforce laws against the use of mobile phones etc whilst driving, and also the habits of smoking, eating, smacking children, shaving, applying makeup whilst driving a car which practices distract attention from the road and cause unnecessary accidents.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
